unnormalised: The rooftop solar subsidy scheme is commendable, especially for households in cities like Chennai. However, clarity is needed regarding disbursement timelines. Many applicants from Tamil Nadu are still awaiting funds since applications filed around 01/01/2023. What is the estimated processing time post inspection, say after 10/10/2024 at 14:00 hrs? Transparency in Rs. per kWp subsidy amounts will encourage wider adoption, fulfilling the 2030 renewable energy targets. More awareness camps in rural India are crucial.
